item.title: BUILDING A LOADBALANCER
item.description: In this post: What is a Load Balancer GCP Load Balancers Creating a Load Balancer using Terraform What is a Load Balancer? Load balancers are networking resources that take in network traffic through their frontend and distribute that traffic to their backend(s). Load balancers have a few general attributes: Frontend Where clients reach the load balancer, the “face” of the load balancer.
